basics.name: Luan La
basics.label:
We are urgently looking for the right people for following positions:

HOT HOT JOBS in NOVEMBER 2017 (Entry level/ Experienced)

** 10 Senior/Software Engineers (C++/PHP/ Python/ Java) based in HCM & HANOI
** 02 Senior/ Android Developers - HCM
** 02 Senior/ QA-QC - HCM
** 02 Senior/ Network Engineers - HANOI
** 02 Senior/ System Engineers - HANOI
** 01 IT Support - HANOI
** 02 Receptionists - HCM

If you are interested in working in an environment that has interesting characteristics such as Work-life balance, Work hard - Play hard, Young & Dynamic; Opportunity to onsite to Singapore, ... Send your resume to me: minhluan.la@ved.com.vn OR Skype me: luanla82

WE OFFER:
• A very attractive salary package
• 13th month salary
• Yearly bonus
• Private health care program
• Lunch & daily food
• Chance to work on-site in Singapore
• Career grow to upper levels and build up your own team

work.company: Vietnam Esports (Garena), 15 Truong Dinh St, Dist 3, HCM City
work.desc:
"Aim to change people's lives by providing great experiments with Internet based services". 
This mission leads us to be the pioneer in e-sports and one of few technology companies providing e-payment & e-commerce platforms. Some key factors about us: 

- One of fastest-growing technology companies in Vietnam. 
- Found 2009 and reached 1,300+ employees in Aug, 2015. 
- 50 Point of Customer Service nationwide besides 3 offices in Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh and Danang cities. 

Vietnam Esports - DARE - DREAM - DISCOVER 
www.vietnamesports.vn
